Cold Chain Craft is a distributor of high-end craft beer products. We are looking for young & energetic people to drive the growth of our business. We are a group of people that believe in simple beginnings, and in good foundations. Everything starts with people doing what they love. So if you love great beer, and if you can appreciate products that are made by family-owned enterprises -- by people who put their heart and soul into what they do --, then this is a good reason to apply. If you already have this appreciation, then we can work with you to create goals that are inspiring. Let's look for more reasons to apply. If you enjoy solving problems and feel challenged by obstacles & roadblocks, this is another good reason to apply. If you like the comfort of an easy 9-to-5 job in a big company, it's maybe a reason not to apply. People like to say work can be fun. In our experience work is fun sometimes, and other times it's not fun. But loving challenges and facing challenges means there's always more fun ahead of you. You will have the full support of experienced team members, who will train you to create solutions and improve how you communicate with customers. But It's your attitude and your desire to use our support, and to learn from our support, that will move you forward. Many companies want you to have a nice resume, a nice list of certificates, lots of nice skills like 'good communication' and 'being a team player'. These types of companies are looking at you as a 'safe' person to employ, and you may also be looking for a job that is 'safe'. For our company, your resume matters less . What matters to us, is that you've taken some risks in life, and that you can live outside of your 'comfort zone'. If you've climbed a mountain, or if you rode your bicycle across Thailand, or if you moved to Tibet because you fell in love with a Sherpa, these are the types of things that matter to us. We are looking for passion, for creativity, for inspiration, and if we choose you to join our company, we will give you the same in return. We are looking for people with a positive attitude, with a sense of adventure, and with lots of stamina. The work experience and the skills, all of this you will get from us, and a whole lot more. You need to be a Thai national, and you need to be based in Bangkok. Write us an email and tell us about yourself, or call us at 081 837 1746 .
